metadata.title: CVE-2020-35132 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An XSS issue has been discovered in phpLDAPadmin before 1.2.6.2 that allowsusers to store malicious values that may be executed by other users at alater time via get_request in lib/function.php.

criterions.comment: phpldapadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
